docs.snippet: The Jets said Geno Smith would start at quarterback in Sunday’s opener, but the team’s owner, Woody Johnson, said the competition would continue....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Jets said Geno Smith would start at quarterback in Sunday’s opener, but the team’s owner, Woody Johnson, said the competition would continue.
docs.abstract: New York Jets announce that Geno Smith will start at quarterback in team's season opener against Tampa Bay Buccaneers, but offer no assurances that the competition is over.

headline.main: Smith Assured of Week 1 Job and Nothing Else

docs.snippet: Beginning in 1965, the Giants have stumbled out of the gate whenever they’ve faced the Cowboys. Twice, though, the Giants have recovered to win the Super Bowl....
docs.lead_paragraph: Beginning in 1965, the Giants have stumbled out of the gate whenever they’ve faced the Cowboys. Twice, though, the Giants have recovered to win the Super Bowl.
docs.abstract: Dallas Cowboys are 5-0 in season openers against New York Giants, but twice the Giants have recovered to win the Super Bowl; both teams are preparing for upcoming season opener in Dallas.

headline.main: In Giants’ Openers Against Dallas, Results Are Sour (for a Week, Anyway)
